name: Bubbles Swimsuit
description:
Play the classic bubble pop game, match 3 colors until clean the levels. In reward for solving the puzzles you can discover new girls in an adventure pixelated.

-16 Gorgeous girls in pixel art.
-33 backgrounds. (17 swimsuits and 16 naked)
-90 levels.
-3 Galleries with pictures of backgrounds (Available like a reward after 30, 60 and 90 levels).
-Windows and full screen mode.
-18 Achievements
-Original Arts and characters.
